title: Ep 274 | Phil's TV Habits Are NOT for the Woke Crowd and Sharing the Gospel with Joe Biden
description:
Phil is getting the feeling that woke and "Gunsmoke" don't mix. Phil, Jase, and Al talk about underestimating Jesus, what it means to be called, and what it means to belong to Jesus. Phil reveals what he would do if he had the opportunity to share the Gospel with Biden like he did with Trump. And the guys begin their study of Romans, aka the constitution of Christianity.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
